ihatha sandahan paridi owun itu karanne poduwe ratata awashya wisheshitha karya bharayak wana heyin manthri sankhyawada adu kirima salaka baliya haka. 2 paksha parlimenthu mathiwarana prakashana nithigatha kirima ihatha sandahan paksha layisthu kramaya anuwa chanda dayakaya wadi awadhanayak yomu kala yuththe mathiwarana prakashanayata bawin eya nishchitha kalayakata (awurudu 06) bala pawathwana paridi eya yuthu athara nadu nimiththakatada hasu karagatha haki paridi nithi handunwadimada kala yuthuya.

demokratik pakshaya mema dakshinanshika udghoshanaya matha trampta erehi thama wiruddhathwaya padanam kale, aasanna washayen warthagatha militari ayawaya anumatha kirimata dhawala mandiraya samanga sahayogi wemin saha pohosathun wenuwen badu kappadu ho sankramanikayan pituwahal kirima ha samuha hiragatha kirimata erehiwa mahajana balamulu ganwimata wiruddha wemini.

sa.jon dewani inimedi lakunu 209k rasa­්kala athara pilithuru lesa tharagaya nimawata pathwanawita panynyananda widuhala kadulu 6kata lakunu 84k laba sitiyeya.sa.jon palamu inima-159 janith lakshan 37 (wiran pranandu 31/4, janaka mendis 22/4) saha dewani inima-209 (dilan pranandu 58/3)shri panynyananda palamu inima-244 thilina perera 60, kanchana pranandu 55 (kanchana giragama 79/5) saha dewani inima-84/6 thilina piris 39 (pasindu sankalpa 36/5).

oba piyage jayagrahanaya, merate prajathanthrawadaya rakiya yuthu yayi aditan karagath langa penena andhakara eekadhipathiwadayen midi merata nawathath minisunta suduwan walin saha rajya thrasthawadayen midunu ratak goda nagimata chandaya dun minisunge jayagrahanayaki.
yanuwen sabhapathiwariya prashna karayi.
obata haki nam ada dawasa arambaannata pera jaya piritha warak ho sajjayana karannata shrawanaya karannata obata ada dawasa wadath suba kara gannata puluwan.
ee prashnayata ape pilithura wanuye ese ekanga wima aniwarya no wana bawa ya.
(makswadaya ha sahithyakala, sucharitha gamlath, pita 16, 2008).
owhu his ahasata ath osawa hullathi.
ee digati dasa.
